metadata.title: Jonathan Rodríguez López - Full Stack Developer | React, Node.js, Python
metadata.description: Portfolio of Jonathan Rodríguez López, Full Stack Developer specialized in React, Node.js, Python, Web3 and Blockchain. Professional web development services in Havana, Cuba. Expertise in automation, AI and APIs.

home.title: Welcome to my Portfolio
home.description: I'm a software developer passionate about creating amazing web experiences

hero.title: Jonathan Rodríguez López
hero.description: Passionate creator of innovative digital solutions with a comprehensive approach, from backend architecture to captivating frontend experiences and process automation. Advanced mastery in JavaScript, Python, React, and Node.js ecosystems, complemented with an arsenal of modern technologies to build robust and scalable applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Versatile and passionate developer dedicated to creating innovative solutions, from backend and frontend design to process automation. Experienced in developing scalable and efficient web applications using JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js, and other modern technologies.
about.description2: Interested in exploring the potential of Web3 and contributing to its development. Extensive experience in project management, including roles as Project Manager, accounting and business management, ensuring quality assurance (Q&A) and process optimization with tools like Odoo and WordPress.

degree.title: Computer Science Engineering
achievements: Specialization in software development and information systems
Final project focused on web solutions for process automation
Participation in hackathons and programming competitions

experience.title: Experience
responsibilities0: Development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB
Implementation of automation solutions to optimize business processes
Project management and coordination with multidisciplinary teams
Development and integration of APIs to connect different services and systems
Optimization of performance and user experience in web applications
